titleStmt.title: The speech of the Right Honourable the Lord Chancellor of Ireland made as he was one of the Lords Justices in their name and behalf of the opening of the Parliament there, the 8th of May 1661.
titleStmt.author: Eustace, Maurice, Sir, ca. 1590-1661.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Attributed to Sir Maurice Eustace. cf. BM.
